Title: Boyfriend
Plot: Dawson feels the heat when Jen is visited by an old boyfriend; Joey lets off a bit too much steam at a beach party and ends up in a sticky situation; and tensions between Mitch and Gale reach the boiling point as they attempt to rebuild their marriage.
ParentalRatingReason: PG Violence, coarse language and sexual references
Writer: Jon Harmon Feldman, Dana Baratta, Charles Rosin, Kar
GuestStars: Scott Foley, Eion Bailey, Jeremy Moore, Paula Davis, John Copeman
